instructions: Open Google Drive on your phone. Tap the + icon in the bottom-right corner. Tap Upload . Select the files you want to upload.
Open the Dropbox app on your phone. Sign up for an account or sign in with Google. Once logged in, tap the + icon .
Open SMS Backup & Restore on your phone. Tap Get Started . Tap Set Up A Backup .
Open Google Contacts on your phone. Tap the menu button at the top-left. Tap Settings .
Open the Settings on your phone. Tap System . Tap Backup .
Open Smart Switch on your old phone. Tap Agree . Tap Allow . Tap Let's Go . Tap Cable or Wireless depending on which method you want to use.
